title: NA & Low-ABV Menu That Doesn’t Tank Throughput
system_mod: Emphasize quick-build specs, shared prep, and clear pricing strategy. Include guidance for staff language to sell NA/low-ABV without sounding apologetic.
venue_context: Busy modern American spot; leadership wants 3 NA and 2 low-ABV options that sell, look premium, and don’t clog the service well.
prompt: How do we create NA/low-ABV options that feel intentional and profitable while keeping service fast? We need specs, pricing guidance, and a short staff script.
